title: SOLD: Old Judge Pud Galvin HOF - PSA
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: SOLD: Old Judge Pud Galvin HOF - PSA
posts.post_content:
Here's a pretty hard to find N172 HOF card.

Pud Galvin, bat at side, trimmed but has an incredible image quality and is slabbed AUTH by PSA.

$SOLD - takes it

[IMG]http://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20160625/758add2c05b66d063690891c709e4204.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20160625/6ce90b644268a574eaa2ef95189b4f39.jpg[/IMG]
This card has been sold. Thanks!
